S04bsu033_u:464: evamukte āyuṣmānānando bhagavantametadavocat - kiṃ punarbhagavan sa dharmākaro bhikṣurbodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyātītaḥ parinirvṛtaḥ,
S04bsu033_u:465: utāho 'nabhisaṃbuddhaḥ atha pratyutpanno 'bhisaṃbuddha etarhi tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati dharmaṃ ca deśayati?

S04bsu033_u:480: evaṃ dakṣiṇapaścimottarāsvadha ūrdhvaṃ digvidikṣu ca ekaikasyāṃ diśi samantādgaṅgānadīvālukopamāni yāvadbuddhakṣetrakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi (Sukhv, Vaidya 234)
S04bsu033_u:481_0: tasya bhagavato 'mitābhasya prabhayā sadā parisphuṭāni sthāpayitvā buddhān bhagavataḥ
S04bsu033_u:482: nāstyānanda upamopanyāso yena śakyaṃ tasyāmitābhasya tathāgatasya prabhāyāḥ pramāṇamudgrahītum /
S04bsu033_u:486_0: sā ca āryaprabhā vimalā vipulā kāyasukhasaṃjananī cittaudvilyakaraṇī devāsuranāgayakṣagandharvagaruḍamahoragakinnaramanuṣyāmanuṣyāṇāṃ
S04bsu033_u:488: anena cānanda paryāyeṇa tathāgataḥ paripūrṇaṃ kalpaṃ bhāṣyet tasyāmitābhasya tathāgatasya nāma karmopādāya prabhāmārabhya,

S04bsu033_u:496: tasya khalu punarānanda amitābhasya tathāgatasyāprameyaḥ śrāvakasaṃgho yasya na sukaraṃ pramāṇamudgrahītum - iyatyaḥ śrāvakakoṭyaḥ,
S04bsu033_u:514: sa ākāṅkṣan trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātau yāvanti tārārūpāṇi tāni sarvāṇyekarātridine nagareṇa gaṇayet,
S04bsu033_u:516: te ca varṣakoṭīniyutaśatasahasramananyakarmaṇā amitābhasya tathāgatasya prathamaśrāvakasaṃnipātaṃ gaṇayeyuḥ /

S04bsu033_u:519: yāvatkalāmapi upamāmapi upanisāmapi na gaṇito bhavet /

S04bsu033_u:534: aparimitaṃ ca ānanda tasya bhagavato 'mitābhasya tathāgatasyāyuḥpramāṇaṃ yasya na sukaraṃ pramāṇamadhigantum,

S04bsu033_u:656_1: vā nirmāṇaratayo vā paranirmitavaśavartino vā brahmakāyikā vā brahmapurohitā vā mahābrahmāṇo

S04bsu033_u:696_0: tadyathā - buddhaśabdaṃ dharmaśabdaṃ saṃghaśabdaṃ pāramitāśabdaṃ bhūmiśabdaṃ balaśabdaṃ
S04bsu033_u:697: śrutvā udāraprītiprāmodyaṃ pratilabhate vivekasahagataṃ virāgasahagataṃ śāntasahagataṃ nirodhasahagataṃ dharmasahagataṃ bodhipariniṣpattikuśalamūlasahagataṃ ca /

S04bsu033_u:710_0: sarve te evaṃrūpeṇa varṇena balena sthāmnā ārohapariṇāhena ādhipatyena puṇyasaṃcayena
S04bsu033_u:712: na khalu punarānanda sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātau sattvā audārikayūṣaphāṇitākārāhāramāharanti /
S04bsu033_u:716: na teṣāṃ bhūyaḥ kāye prakṣepaḥ karaṇīyaḥ /

S04bsu033_u:719: tasya sarvaśo gandharvarājño vāsanā na samudācarati /
S04bsu033_u:721: teṣāṃ tathārūpaiśca taiḥ sarvaṃ tadbuddhakṣetraṃ parisphuṭaṃ bhavati /
S04bsu033_u:723: teṣāṃ tādṛśaireva cīvararatnaiḥ sarvaṃ tadbuddhakṣetraṃ parisphuṭaṃ bhavati,
S04bsu033_u:726_0: tadyathā - śīrṣābharaṇāni vā karṇābharaṇāni vā grīvābharaṇāni vā hastapādābharaṇāni
S04bsu033_u:726_1: vā yadidaṃ mukuṭāni kuṇḍalāni kaṭakakeyūrāṇi vatsahārā rūcakahārā karṇikā mudrikāḥ
S04bsu033_u:726_2: svarṇasūtrāṇi mekhalāḥ svarṇasūtāṇi jālāni muktājālāni sarvaratnajālāni svarṇaratnakiṅkiṇījālāni,
S04bsu033_u:730: te yādṛśaṃ vimānamākāṅkṣanti yadvarṇaliṅgasaṃsthānaṃ yāvadārohapariṇāhaṃ nānāratnamayaniryūhaśatasahasrasamalaṃkṛtaṃ nānādivyapuṣpasaṃstīrṇaṃ citropadhānavinyastaparyaṅkam,
S04bsu033_u:732: teṣu manonirvṛtteṣu vimāneṣu saptasaptāsparasahasraparivṛtāḥ puraskṛtā viharanti krīḍanti ramante paricārayanti // Sukhv_19 //
S04bsu033_u:735: na ca tatra lokadhātau devānāṃ vā manuṣyāṇāṃ vā nānātvamasti anyatra saṃvṛtivyavahāreṇa devamanuṣyāviti saṃkhyāṃ gacchanti /
S04bsu033_u:736: tadyathā ānanda rājñaścakravartinaḥ purato manuṣyahīno manuṣyapretako na bhāsate na tapate na virocate,
S04bsu033_u:737: na ca bhavati viśārado na prabhāśvaraḥ,
S04bsu033_u:738_0: evameva devānāṃ paranirmitavaśavartināṃ purataḥ śakro devānāmindro na bhāsate na
S04bsu033_u:738_1: tapate na virocate yadidamudyānavimānavastrābharaṇairādhipatyena ṛddhyā vā prātihāryeṇa
S04bsu033_u:741: evaṃ sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātau manuṣyā draṣṭavyāḥ // Sukhv_20 //
S04bsu033_u:744: tasyāṃ khalu punarānanda sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātau pūrvāhṇakālasamaye pratyupasthite samantāccaturdiśamākulāḥ samākulā vāyavo vānti /
S04bsu033_u:745_0: teṣāṃ ratnavṛkṣāṇāṃ citrān darśanīyān nānāvarṇānanekavṛntān nānāsurabhidivyagandhaparivāsitān
S04bsu033_u:745_1: kṣobhayanti saṃkṣobhayanti īrayanti samīrayanti yato bahūni puṣpaśatāni tasyāṃ ratnamayyāṃ
S04bsu033_u:747: tadyathāpi nāma puruṣaḥ kuśalaḥ pṛthivyāṃ puṣpasaṃstaraṃ saṃstṛṇuyāt,
S04bsu033_u:749: evameva tadbuddhakṣetraṃ taiḥ puṣpairnānāgandhavarṇaiḥ samantātsaptapauruṣaṃ sphuṭaṃ bhavati /
S04bsu033_u:750: tāni ca puṣpajātāni mṛdūni kācilindikasukhasaṃsparśāni aupamyamātreṇa,
S04bsu033_u:753: nirgate punaḥ pūrvāhṇakālasamaye tāni puṣpāṇi niravaśeṣamantardhīyante /
S04bsu033_u:754: athe tadbuddhakṣetraṃ viviktaṃ ramyaṃ śubhaṃ bhavatyaparikliṣṭaiḥ pūrvapuṣpaiḥ /
S04bsu033_u:758: evaṃ madhyāhnakālasamaye saṃdhyāyāṃ rātryāḥ prathame yāme madhyame yāme paścime yāme /
S04bsu033_u:759: taiśca vātairvāyadbhirnānāgandhaparivāsitaiste sattvāḥ spṛṣṭāḥ santaḥ evaṃ sukhasamarpitā bhavanti tadyathāpi nāma nirodhasamāpanno bhikṣuḥ // Sukhv_21 //
S04bsu033_u:762: tasmiścānanda buddhakṣetre sarvaśo 'gnisūryacandragrahanakṣatratārārūpāṇāṃ tamondhakārasya nāmadheyaprajñapraptirapi nāsti /
S04bsu033_u:763: sarvaśo rātriṃdivaṃ prajñaptirapi nāsti anyatra tathāgatavyavahārāt,
S04bsu033_u:767: tasyāṃ khalu punarānanda sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātau kāle divyagandhodakameghā abhipravarṣayanti divyāni sarvavarṇikāni kusumāni,
S04bsu033_u:779: tasmin khalu punarānanda buddhakṣetre ye sattvā upapannā utpadyante utpasyante,
S04bsu033_u:782: nāsti tatra dvayo rāśyorvyavasthānaṃ prajñaptirvā yadidamaniyatasya vā mithyātvaniyatasya vā /
S04bsu033_u:783: tadanenāpyānanda paryāyeṇa sā lokadhātuḥ sukhāvatītyucyate saṃkṣiptena,
S04bsu033_u:785: kalpo 'pyānanda parikṣīyeta sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātau sukhakāraṇeṣu parikīrtyamāneṣu,
S04bsu033_u:786: na ca teṣāṃ sukhakāraṇānāṃ śakyaṃ paryantamadhigantum // Sukhv_24 //
S04bsu033_u:789: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu033_u:791: te kalpakoṭīmatha vāpi cottariṃ sukhāvatīvarṇa prakāśayeyuḥ // Sukhv_vs_23 //
S04bsu033_u:792: kṣaye kalpakoṭī vajre surāśca sukhāvatīye na ca varṇasāruḥ /
S04bsu033_u:793: kṣayaṃ na gacchetpratibhā ca teṣāṃ prakāśayantāna tu varṇa nānāṃ // Sukhv_vs_24 //
S04bsu033_u:794: ye lokadhātū paramāṇusādṛśāṃśchidyeya bhidyeya rajaśca kuryāt /
S04bsu033_u:795: ato bahū uttari lokadhātu pūreta dānaṃ ratanāhi dadyāt // Sukhv_vs_25 //
S04bsu033_u:796: naitā kalāpi upamāpi tasya puṇyasya bhontī pṛthulokadhātavaḥ /
S04bsu033_u:797: ye lokadhātūya sukhāvatīye śrutvaiva nāmaṃ bhavatīha puṇyam // Sukhv_vs_26 //
S04bsu033_u:798: tato bahū puṇya bhaveta teṣāṃ ye śraddhate jinavacanaṃ saprajñāḥ /
S04bsu033_u:799: śraddhā hi mūlaṃ jagatasya prāptaye tasmāddhi śrutvā vicitiṃ vinodayet // Sukhv_vs_27 //
S04bsu033_u:804_0: tasya khalu punarānanda bhagavato 'mitābhasya tathāgatasya daśasu dikṣu ekaikasyāṃ
S04bsu033_u:804_1: diśi gaṅgānadīvālukāsameṣu buddhakṣetreṣu gaṅgānadīvālukāsamā buddhā bhagavanto nāmadheyaṃ (Sukhv, Vaidya 241)
S04bsu033_u:815: ye cānanda kecitsattvāstaṃ tathāgataṃ punaḥ satkāramanasikariṣyanti,
S04bsu033_u:818: teṣāṃ so 'mitābhastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho maraṇakālasamaye pratyupasthite 'nekabhikṣugaṇaparivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ sthāsyati /
S04bsu033_u:819: tataste taṃ bhagavantaṃ dṛṣṭvā prasannacittāścyutāḥ santastatraiva sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātāvupapatsyante /
S04bsu033_u:820: yaśca ānanda ākāṅkṣeta kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā kimityahaṃ dṛṣṭa eva dharme tamamitābhaṃ tathāgataṃ paśyeyamiti,
S04bsu033_u:821: tenānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādya adhyāśayātiśayatayā saṃtatyā tasmin buddhakṣetre cittaṃ saṃpreṣya upapattaye kuśalamūlāni ca pariṇāmayitavyāni // Sukhv_27 //
S04bsu033_u:824: ye punastaṃ tathāgataṃ na bhūyo manasikariṣyanti,
S04bsu033_u:826: teṣāṃ tādṛśenaiva so 'mitābhastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho varṇasaṃsthānārohapariṇāhena bhikṣusaṃghaparivāreṇa ca tādṛśa eva buddhinirmito maraṇakālasamaye purataḥ sthāsyati /
S04bsu033_u:827: te tenaiva tathāgatadarśanaprasādālambanena samādhinā apramuṣitayā smṛtyā cyutāstatraiva buddhakṣetre pratyājaniṣyanti // Sukhv_28 //
S04bsu033_u:832: gambhīreṣu ca dharmeṣu bhāṣyamāṇeṣu tuṣṭiṃ pratilapsyante,
S04bsu033_u:843_0: imaṃ khalvānanda arthavaśaṃ saṃpaśya tathāgatā daśasu dikṣu aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāsu lokadhātuṣu
S04bsu033_u:843_1: tasyāmitābhasya tathāgatasya nāmagheyaṃ parikīrtayanto varṇaṃ ghoṣayantaḥ saṃpraśaṃsāmabhyudīrayanti /
S04bsu033_u:844_0: tasmin khalu punarānanda buddhakṣetre daśabhyo digbhya ekaikasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukāsamā
S04bsu033_u:844_1: bodhisattvāstamamitābhaṃ tathāgatamupasaṃkramanti darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya paripraśnīkaraṇāya,
S04bsu033_u:845: taṃ ca bodhisattvagaṇaṃ tāṃśca buddhakṣetraguṇālaṃkāravyūhasaṃpadviśeṣān draṣṭum // Sukhv_30 //
S04bsu033_u:848: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimamevārthaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā paridīpayannimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu033_u:849: yathaiva gaṅgānadīvālukāsamā buddhāna kṣetrā amitāyunāyakam // Sukhv_vs_28 //
S04bsu033_u:851: bahupuṣpapūṭī gṛhītva te nānāvarṇaṃ surabhī manoramāṃ /
S04bsu033_u:853: tatha dakṣiṇapaścimottarāsu buddhāna kṣetrā daśatāsu yāttakāḥ /
S04bsu033_u:854: yato yato āgami buddha vandituṃ sabodhisattvā amitāyunāyakam // Sukhv_vs_30 //
S04bsu033_u:857: pūjitva vā te bahubodhisattvā vanditva pādāmamitaprabhasya /
S04bsu033_u:858: pradakṣiṇīkṛtya vadanti caivaṃ aho 'dbhutaṃ śobhati buddhakṣetram // Sukhv_vs_32 //
S04bsu033_u:859: te puṣpapūṭīhi punokiranti udagracittā atulāya prītiye /
S04bsu033_u:860: kāmaṃ prabhāṣanti purasta nāyake asmāpi kṣetraṃ siya evarūpam // Sukhv_vs_33 //
S04bsu033_u:861: ye puṣpapūṭā iti kṣipta tatra chatraṃtayā saṃsthihi yojanāśatam /
S04bsu033_u:862: svalaṃkṛtaṃ śobhati citraravato chādante buddhasya samanta kāyam // Sukhv_vs_34 //
S04bsu033_u:863: te bodhisattvā tathā satkaritvā kathaṃ karontī iti tuṣṭa tatra /
S04bsu033_u:864: sulabdha lābhāḥ khalu tehi sattvaiḥ yehī śrutaṃ nāma narottamasya // Sukhv_vs_35 //
S04bsu033_u:865: asmehi pī lābha sulabdhapūrvā yadā gatāsya ima buddhakṣetram /
S04bsu033_u:866: paśyātha svapnopama maitra kīdṛśaṃ yatkalpitaṃ kalpasahasra śāstuḥ // Sukhv_vs_36 //
S04bsu033_u:868: paśyātha buddhā vara puṇyarāśiḥ parivṛto śobhati bodhisattvaiḥ /
S04bsu033_u:869: amitābhasya ābhā amitā ca tejā amitaṃ ca āyūramitaśca saṃghaḥ // Sukhv_vs_37 //
S04bsu033_u:871: ye niścaritvā mukhamaṇḍalātaḥ sphūranti kṣetrāṇi sahasrakoṭīḥ // Sukhv_vs_38 //
S04bsu033_u:872: tāḥ sarvasūrīḥ punaretya tatra mūrdhe ca astaṃ gami nāyakasya /
S04bsu033_u:873: devā manuṣyā janayanti prītiṃ arcistadā asyamidāṃ viditvā // Sukhv_vs_39 //
S04bsu033_u:874: uttiṣṭhate buddhasuto mahāyaśā nātha so hi avalokiteśvaraḥ /
S04bsu033_u:875: ko heturatra bhagavaṃ kaḥ pratyayo yena smitaṃ kurvasi lokanātha // Sukhv_vs_40 //
S04bsu033_u:876: taṃ vyākarohī yatra so 'rthakovido hitānukampī bahusattvamocakaḥ /
S04bsu033_u:877: śrutveti vācaṃ paramāṃ manoramāṃ udagracittā bhaviṣyanti sattvāḥ // Sukhv_vs_41 //
S04bsu033_u:878: ye bodhisattvā bahulokadhātutaḥ sukhāvatīṃ prasthita buddha paśyatāṃ /
S04bsu033_u:879: te śrutvā prītiṃ vipulāṃ janetvā kṣipramimaṃ kṣetra vilokayeyuḥ // Sukhv_vs_42 //
S04bsu033_u:880: āgatya ca kṣetramidaṃ udāraṃ ṛddhībalaṃ prāpuṇi kṣiprameva /
S04bsu033_u:881: divyaṃ ca cakṣustatha śrotra divyaṃ jātismarāḥ pāramikovidāśca // Sukhv_vs_43 //
S04bsu033_u:882: amitāyu buddhastada vyākaroti mama hyayaṃ praṇidhi babhūva pūrvam /
S04bsu033_u:883: kathaṃ pi sattvā śruṇiyāni nāma vrajeyu kṣetraṃ mama nityameva // Sukhv_vs_44 //
S04bsu033_u:885: sa me ayaṃ praṇidhi prapūrṇa śobhanā sattvāśca ebhi bahulokadhātutaḥ /
S04bsu033_u:886: āgatya kṣipraṃ mama antikasmiṃ avaivartikā bhontiha ekajātiyā // Sukhv_vs_45 //
S04bsu033_u:887: tasmādya icchatiha bodhisattvaḥ mamāpi kṣetraṃ siya evarūpam /
S04bsu033_u:888: ahaṃ pi sattvān bahu mocayeyaṃ nāmena ghoṣeṇa tha darśanena // Sukhv_vs_46 //
S04bsu033_u:889: sa śīghraśīghraṃ tvaramāṇarūpaḥ sukhāvatīṃ gacchatu lokadhātum /
S04bsu033_u:890: gattvā ca pūrvamamitaprabhasya pūjetu buddhāna sahasrakoṭīḥ // Sukhv_vs_47 //
S04bsu033_u:891: buddhāna koṭī bahu pūjayitvā ṛddhībalena bahu kṣetra gattvā /
S04bsu033_u:892: kṛtvāna pūjāṃ sugatāna santike bhaktyā gamiṣyanti sukhāvatītaḥ // Sukhv_vs_48 //
S04bsu033_u:896: tasya khalu punarānanda amitāyuṣastathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya bodhivṛkṣaḥ /
S04bsu033_u:898_1: sadāpatraḥ sadāpuṣpaḥ sadāphalo nānāvarṇo 'nekaśatasahasravarṇo nānāpatro nānāpuṣpo
S04bsu033_u:899: tasya khalu punarānanda bodhivṛkṣasya vātasamīritasya yaḥ śabdo ghoṣo niścarati so 'parimāṇāṃllokadhātūn vijñāpayati /
S04bsu033_u:900: tatrānanda yeṣāṃ sattvānāṃ sa bodhivṛkṣaḥ śrotrāvabhāsamāgacchati,
S04bsu033_u:904: ye khalu punarānanda sattvāstato bodhivṛkṣādgandhaṃ jighranti,
S04bsu033_u:905: teṣāṃ yāvadbodhiparyantaṃ na jātu ghrāṇaroagaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ /

S04bsu033_u:909: bhavanti, teṣāṃ yāvadbodhiparyantaṃ na jātu kāyarogaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ /
S04bsu033_u:910: ye ca khalu punarānanda sattvāstaṃ bodhivṛkṣaṃ dharmato nidhyāyanti,
S04bsu033_u:911: teṣāṃ tata upādāya yāvadbodhiparyantaṃ na jātu cittavikṣepaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ /
S04bsu033_u:912: sarve ca te sattvāḥ sahadarśanāttasya bodhivṛkṣasyāvaivartikāḥ saṃtiṣṭhante yadutānuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ /
S04bsu033_u:916: tatraiva khalu punarānanda ye bodhisattvāḥ pratyājātāḥ pratyājāyante pratyājaniṣyante vā,
S04bsu033_u:917_0: sarve te ekajātipratibaddhāstata evānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyante sthāpayitvā
S04bsu033_u:917_1: praṇidhānavaśaṃ ye te bodhisattvā mahāsiṃhanādanādina udārasaṃnāhasaṃnaddhāḥ sarvasattvaparinirvāṇābhiyuktāśca // Sukhv_33 //
S04bsu033_u:920: tasmina khalu punarānanda buddhakṣetre ye śrāvakānte vyāmaprabhāḥ,
S04bsu033_u:922: sthāpayitvā dvau bodhisattvau yayoḥ prabhayā sā lokadhātuḥ satatasamitaṃ nityāvabhāsasphuṭā /

S04bsu033_u:924: bhagavānāha - ekastayorānanda avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ dvitīyo mahāsthāmaprāpto nāma /
S04bsu033_u:925: ita eva cānanda buddhakṣetrāccyutā tau tatropapannau // Sukhv_34 //
S04bsu033_u:928: tatra cānanda buddhakṣetre ye bodhisattvāḥ pratyājātāḥ,
S04bsu033_u:932: tasmin khalu punarānanda buddhakṣetre ye bodhisattvā pratyājātāḥ,
S04bsu033_u:934_0: sarve te tata upādāya na jātu jātismarā bhaviṣyanti sthāpayitvā tathārūpeṣu kalpasaṃkṣobheṣu
S04bsu033_u:934_1: ye pūrvasthānapraṇihitāḥ pañcasu kaṣāyeṣu vartamāneṣu yadā buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ loke
S04bsu033_u:934_2: prādurbhāvo bhavati tadyathāpi nāma mamaitarhi // Sukhv_36 //
S04bsu033_u:937: tasmin khalu punarānanda buddhakṣetre ye bodhisattvāḥ pratyājātāḥ,
S04bsu033_u:938: sarve te ekapurobhaktenānyāṃllokadhātūn gatvā anekāni buddhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇyupatiṣṭhanti yāvadākāṅkṣanti buddhānubhāvena /
S04bsu033_u:939: te yathā yathā cittamutpādayanti evamevaṃrūpaiḥ puṣpadhūpadīpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākāvaijayantītūryasaṃgītivādyaiḥ pūjāṃ kuryāma iti,
S04bsu033_u:940: teṣāṃ sahacittotpādāttathārūpāṇi ca sarvapūjāvidhānāni pāṇau prādurbhavanti /
S04bsu033_u:941: te taiḥ puṣpairyāvadvādyaisteṣu buddheṣu bhagavatsu pūjāṃ kurvanto bahvaparimāṇāsaṃkhyeyaṃ kuśalamupacinvanti /
